title: Crime Alert 12.21.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert 12.21.20
description:
Singer tells police gun fires when it falls off table striking friend in forehead. 12-year-old goes on 100 mile joy ride in dad's luxury SUV.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
